constrain.lab.robot_assembly

Functions

make_virtual_plates_fromDF(f_primers, ...)

This function can make virtual plates from lists of primers and templates.

picklist_from_plates(F_primer_plate, ...)

This function can generate picklist from virtual plates and pandas dataframe with PCR components

well_keys_96([row])

If true it generates keys for a 96 well plate by row.

Classes

LiquidHandler()

This class is is a subclass of the synbiopython Transfer class and be used to make flowbot instructions

RobotAssembly(Pandas_dataframe_PCR, ...)

Class to generate instructions for robot on demand.
